title: How would you think of 'participating' music listening experience? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are a team to developing a new music listening technology that allows users not only to do passive music listing but also playing, altering, and personalizing your favorite music. We are curious about your thoughts and feedbacks about our idea. Below is the link of our web demo (Sorry it only works with PC, not yet Mobile devices). And please don't worry about our primitive looking address. We just didn't decide our domain name yet. http://15.164.49.171/en We're in the developing stage so your feedback is greatly appreciated!
